about_the_game:
A new basketball league has been founded and you've been chosen by the commissioner to become the general manager of a team! Manage, trade, and sign players to help lead your franchise to a championship.

FEATURES

  • Take control and manage your own basketball franchise

  • Play and/or simulate matches with live play-by-play feedback and statistics

  • Trade and sign players to help improve your team

  • Set up coaching tactics to further enhance your team's performance on the court

  • View league news, player highlights, and social media posts by fans

  • Progress through season, all-star, and playoff matches

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: x86_32 CPU with SSE2 instructions
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Integrated graphics with Vulkan 1.0 support
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 11
  • Processor: x86_64 CPU with SSE4.2 instructions
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Dedicated graphics with Vulkan 1.2 support
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
